channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Photoshop Elements
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Photoshop Elements

item.title: CVE-2021-28597|2024-09-17T01:26:48.062Z -- adobe -- photoshop%20elements
item.description: Adobe Photoshop Elements version 5.2 (and earlier) is affected by an insecure temporary file creation vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to call functions against the installer to perform high privileged actions. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.
